problem_text: A projectile is launched from ground level with speed \(v_0\) at angle \(\theta\) above the horizontal. Neglect air resistance. Derive expressions for (a) the time of flight, (b) the maximum height, and (c) the horizontal range.
diagram_request: Parabolic trajectory launched from origin at angle θ; show initial velocity vector and components; mark maximum height and horizontal range.
solution_steps: Solve y(T)=0 to obtain time of flight \(T=2v_0\sin\theta/g\).
common_mistakes: Confusing max-height time with total flight time
